alert.note: Alert for Clark (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 03 at 2:32AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Clark County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
